concept.title: Divide
concept.shortdesc: The method for dividing large numbers into smaller groups or parts.

conbody.p: To divide a number we take an established number and seperate it as many times as determined by the second number.
If we begin with the number [40] and separate it (divide) into [5] equal parts, we are left with [8] parts.
In the JPS Calculator App the divide fucntion is represented by the [/] key.
